pros: Has strong map control with Aether Swords that fly around the map
Has a reactive playstyle with useful skills that can be used to dash back from danger or negate damage with precise timing
Has a bind Blade Torrent
Has 2 iFrame Aether Guard and Infinite
cons: Has micro-management with keeping track of cooldowns and active Aether Swords
Can be a bit spammy by constantly pressing buttons to keep damage up

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives and buffs with cooldowns
Final Damage: +55% + (up to 15% from Resonance Rush buff)
Boss Damage: +10% + (up to 4% from Link Skill)
Ignore DEF: +20% + (up to 15% from Resonance Rush buff)

buffInfo.active: (Toggle), (Toggle), ,
buffInfo.summons: , (30s cd), (180s cd), (90s cd)
buffInfo.buffCd: (120s cd), (180s cd)
buffInfo.buffFifth: (200s cd), (240s cd), (180s cd), (240s cd)
buffInfo.binds: (180s cd)
buffInfo.iFrame: (60s cd), (180s cd)

build: -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Trigger - Reinforce and Trigger - Boss Rush
  • Resonance Rush - Efficiency
  • Reign of Destruction - Persist
  • Aether Blossom - Cooldown Cutter

extraContent.title: Aether Weaving
extraContent.content:
Adele has a secondary resource (unlocked in 2nd Job) called Aether Weaving that is used to activate certain skills and create 'Aether Swords' that can be commanded. Aether Weaving is generated passively and whenever you attack an enemy with a 'Trigger' skill

  • Every 100 'Aether Weaving', an Aether Sword is readied
  • When a sword is readied, you can summon it using Hunting Decree (3rd Job)
  • These swords are used primarily for and cannot be used before 3rd Job
  • Each sword represents 100 AE which skills that consume AE can use
  • In 2nd Job, you can hold up to 2 Swords (200 AE) at a time and 3 Swords (300 AE) in 4th Job+
  • Note if you use any skill that consumes AE, your Aether Sword will disappear and be consumed as AE

Below is a list of all Trigger skills:

  • Skewering (2nd Job)
  • Eviscerate (3rd Job)
  • Cleave (4th Job)
  • Plummet (4th Job)

primary.name: Artistic Recall
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, you move to Ristonia.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Magic Conversion
primary.shortDesc: 35% of your equipment's Magic ATT is converted to Attack Power, excluding your weapon. Any set effects do not apply. Only converts up to 15% of your weapon's base Attack Power.

primary.name: Recalling Greatness
primary.shortDesc: Critical Damage: +10%, Attack Power: +10%
details:
This skill is gained and leveled up by completing the Adele storyline
  • The storyline spans all the way up to Lv. 200

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Blade of Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, Damage: 85%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 5
primary.desc: Swings a sword forward

primary.name: Magic Dispatch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 80%, Number of Attacks: 3, Magical Shards: 5\nCooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: Creates homing shards that seek out nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Jaunt
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details:
Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
  • While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump

primary.name: High Rise
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, allows you to remain in the air for a short time
primary.desc: While in the air, pressing the Skill Key or pressing the Up Key twice will allow you to float for a short period of time
details: Using the skill again or using will stop the skill
You can lock the skill by right-clicking the skill to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys
To unlock this skill, you need to complete Adele's storyline

primary.name: Martial Discipline
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30, Defense: +200, Max HP: +1000\nSpeed: +10, Jump: +10, Knockback Resistance: +60%\nDamage Taken: -10%

primary.name: Aether Weaving
primary.shortDesc: Obtain 5 aether at regular intervals, obtain 12 aether when Trigger skill hits, can obtain up to 300.\nWhen Aether Forge is active, every 100 aether can create 2 aether swords. Up to 4 aether swords can be created at a time.
primary.desc: A special resource that generates passively and whenever you attack an enemy with a 'Trigger' skill

primary.name: Aether Crystal
primary.shortDesc:
Duration: 30 sec, up to 7 can exist on the map.
If the max limit is reached and another one is created, the crystal with the lowest duration vanishes.
The crystal cannot be created near another crystal, or near certain platforms such as those that cannot be reached.
Cooldown: 4 sec
primary.desc: Whenever an Aether Sword attack hits an enemy, there is a chance to leave behind a crystal
details: Using Resonance will dash towards the crystals consuming it

Up to 7 crystals can be active at a time and last 30 secs each
  • Creating a new crystal will cause the oldest crystal to expire if there are already 7 crystals active

primary.name: Skewering
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Damage: 80%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Launches multiple swords forward

primary.name: Aether Forge
primary.shortDesc:
When Trigger Skill hits, deal 200% damage to up to 10 enemies every 9.5 sec Reaching your 3rd and 4th job will reduce attack cooldown by 4 sec each.
Attack 1 times per aether sword.
Each successful attack has a 30% chance to create an aether crystal.
Cooldown: 0.5 sec
primary.desc: When toggled, when a Trigger skills hit an enemy, Aether Swords will brandish in front of you that has a chance to leave behind a
details: The size of the attack will change based on the amount of Aether Energy you have currently
Hunting Decree (3rd Job) can only be activated when this skill is toggled on
Cooldown of the attack will be reduced each Job Advancement
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Impale
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Aether Cost: 15\nDamage: 85%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6\nCooldown: 7 sec
primary.desc: Creates an Aether Sword while shooting it forward that leaves behind a
details: You can use the Arrow Keys to decide the direction the Aether Sword is launched
Can be linked with Resonance Rush to quickly dash but no crystal will be created

primary.name: Resonance Rush
primary.shortDesc:
Aether crystal used with Resonance Rush vanishes.
Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6
If total enemies struck is lower than the max, an additional 15% is added to the final damage for each enemy below the max. Increased final damage is additive.
When attack hits, a buff triggers for 30 sec that increases final damage by 5% and Enemy DEF Ignored by 5%. Can be stacked up to 2 times.
primary.desc: Lunges a sword forward while dashing
details: Deals increased %Damage the fewer enemies there are

Can only be used when there is a nearby or when linked with
  • crystal will disappear if you dash to it
You can use the Arrow Keys to decide the direction you dash towards
If the skill hits an enemy, you gain a stacking buff that increases %Final Damage and %Ignore DEF (up to 3 times)

primary.name: Aetherial Arms
primary.shortDesc: When Trigger Skill hits, creates shard every 8 sec, consume 25 MP upon creation.\nMagic Dispatch and Aetherial Arms Damage: +30%p\nCooldown: 0.5 sec
primary.desc: When toggled, Trigger attacks will periodically activate automatically
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of

primary.name: Weave Infusion
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Increases attack speed of Bladecaster for 200 sec.
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Bladecaster Control
primary.shortDesc: Bladecaster Mastery: +50%\nAttack Power: +30

primary.name: Will to Live
primary.shortDesc: Every 5 sec, restores 4% of Max HP/MP even in combat.

primary.name: Elite Training
primary.shortDesc: STR +60

primary.name: Eviscerate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 220%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Slashes your sword forward

primary.name: Hunting Decree
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40, Aether Cost: 100
For each aether sword, Duration: 40 sec, Damage: 240%, Number of Attacks: 2
Can command up to 4 swords. When you exceed the max number and a command is given, the aether sword with the least duration left vanishes.
When attack hits, 15% chance to create aether crystal.
Cooldown: 0.5 sec
primary.desc: Summons 2 Aether Swords to seek out and attack nearby enemies
details:
Up to 4 Aether Swords can be active at a time (in 3rd Job)
  • The oldest Aether Swords will be replaced if 4 are already active
Can only be activated when is toggled on
Attack has a chance to create a
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Noble Summons
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 260%, Number of Attacks: 4
Debuffs enemies for 30 sec. During that time, Adele ignores 10% of those enemies' DEF.
Each successful attack has a 90% chance to create an aether crystal.
Cooldown: 12 sec.
primary.desc: Commands all your swords to return to you while damaging and debuffing enemies in its path
details: [Debuff]: Adele's attack towards this target has increased %Ignore DEF
Attack has a chance to create a
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Reign of Destruction
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, Territory Duration: 7 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 100%, Number of Attacks: 4\nThe sword turns when duration ends, attacking an additional 12 times dealing 550% damage up to 12 enemies.\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Creates a zone of piercing swords
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect
At the end of the duration, the attack explodes damaging nearby enemies

primary.name: True Nobility
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Creates a spirit field for 20 sec.\nReceive 30% of the damage dealt to party members inside the field and create a shield equal to 80% of that damage.\nCooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: Creates a barrier around you where party members redirect some of the damage to you by creating a shield for you
details: Pressing the Skill Key again will cancel the shield

primary.name: Feather Float
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 46, Aether Cost: 20
Move back a short distance.
Cooldown: 6 sec
[Passive Effect: Speed: +5, Jump: +10, Max Speed: +10]
primary.desc: Dashes backward
details: Can be used while using a 'Trigger' skill
[Passive]: Permanently increases Movement Speed, Jump and Max Movement Speed

primary.name: Ascent
primary.shortDesc:
Attack Power: +30, Final Damage: +15%, Critical Rate: +20%
Magic Dispatch and Aetherial Arms Damage: +115%p
Aether Forge Damage: +240%p
Impale Damage: +100%p
Resonance Rush Damage: +125%p

primary.name: Tolerance
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance: +40%, Max HP: +10%, Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%\nDamage Taken: -20%

primary.name: Aether Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Obtain up to 400 aether.\nIncreases max aether swords that can be created with Aether Forge, and commanded with Hunting Decree, to 6.
details: Increases max Aether and amount of swords creatable from 4 to 6

primary.name: Cleave
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Damage: 375%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 7
primary.desc: Slashes a giant sword forward
details: There are 3 different attacks that can randomly trigger

primary.name: Aether Bloom
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80. For each aether sword, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 650%, Number of Attacks: 8
If one enemy gets hit by Aether Bloom multiple times, the skill's final damage on that enemy is reduced by 25%.
When attack hits, 50% chance to create aether crystal.
Cooldown: 20 sec
primary.desc: Commands all your swords to spin damaging nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect and cooldown resets
Duration of Aether Swords will not go down when attack is active
Attack has a chance to create a crystal
If an enemy is hit by multiple Aether Swords, each additional sword deals reduced damage

primary.name: Grave Proclamation
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 150, Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 10
Increases damage to enemy with mark of death by 20%, and ignores additional 10% defense rate.
If there is an enemy with the mark within attack range of Hunting Decree or Infinity Blade, the attack will focus on that enemy.
Cooldown: 90 sec
primary.desc: Marks an enemy causing all Aether Swords to target them
details: [Debuff]: Attacks towards this enemy deals increased %Damage and %Ignore Def
If you press the Skill Key again, the mark can be moved to another target if there is a mark active
The skill will target the enemy with the highest Max HP
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Aether Guard
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 150. Key can be held up to 8 sec. Damage taken while key is held, including attacks that deal damage in proportion to Max HP, is reduced by 40%.
If you use the moment you are attacked, you are invincible for 3 sec and the damage is blocked.
When the skill ends, cooldown is reduced by 3.5 sec for each sec remaining from holding the key.
Cooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: An Aether Sword rotates around you, protecting you
details: When held, damage taken including %HP attacks is reduced
If you press and release the Skill Key instantly, you will instead parry an enemy attack, becoming invincible for a few seconds
Cooldown is reduced based on the duration the skill was held
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Plummet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45. Drop vertically when used in the air, Damage: 550%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 6\nCooldown: 1.5 sec
primary.desc: Dive down at your location damaging enemies in your path
details: Can be used in the air to dive down vertically

primary.name: Hero of the Flora
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Floran Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Bladecaster Expertise
primary.shortDesc: Bladecaster Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +30
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery and Attack provided

primary.name: Perfection
primary.shortDesc:
Magic Dispatch and Aetherial Arms Damage: +225%p
Aether Forge Damage: +270%p
Impale Damage: +200%p
Resonance Rush Damage: +265%p
Hunting Decree Damage: +120%p
Noble Summons Damage: +300%p
Reign of Destruction Damage: +300%p
details: Increases %p Damage increased provided

primary.name: Ruination
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +30%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +20%

primary.name: Strive
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30, Boss Damage: +10%, Critical Rate: +20%, Max HP: +15%

hyperPassive.name: Trigger - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of all Trigger skills

hyperPassive.name: Trigger - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of all Trigger skills

hyperPassive.name: Trigger - Boss Rush
details: Increases %Boss Damage of all Trigger skills

hyperPassive.name: Resonance Rush - Efficiency
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Obtain 20 aether when aether crystal is used for Resonance Rush. Does not consume aether when using Impale.

hyperPassive.name: Will to Live - Aura Reinforce
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Recovery Ratio: +3%, additive to existing recovery.

hyperPassive.name: True Nobility - Shield Reinforce
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Increases shield amount created in proportion to damage by 350%.

hyperActive.name: Shardbreaker
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 250, creates a shard in the location of up to 7 enemies.
For each shard that is created and shattered, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 6
If all of the shards attack only 1 enemy, final damage of Shardbreaker is increased by 300%.
If total enemies struck is lower than the max, creates up to 5 shards in random locations.
After shards shatter, creates up to 5 aether crystals.
Cooldown: 60 sec
hyperActive.desc: Creates shards at the location of enemies that explode
details: Deals damage when the shards land and explode
Deals increased %Damage if only one enemy is hit
Creates at the location of the explosion

hyperActive.name: Blade Torrent
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 12
Stun Duration: 10 sec
Stun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Blade Torrent.
Cooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: Launches swords that binds nearby enemies

hyperActive.name: Divine Wrath
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Flora class in the party.

fifthMain.name: Ruin
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 15
An attack that deals 500% damage 6 times when summoned and activates 12 times.
After it's summoned, an additional sword pierce deals 900% damage 9 times and activates 8 times.
Cooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a giant sword that rains down from the sky dealing damage while coming down and after it lands

fifthMain.name: Infinity Blade
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, invincible during casting and disarmament
Duration: 30 sec, creates 18 aether swords that attack 2 times with 700% damage
On successful hits, 5% chance to create an aether crystal.
Cooldown 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates several special Aether Swords that seek out and attack nearby enemies like
details: Infinity Blade Aether Swords are only affected by and cannot trigger or
Has a small chance to create a crystal
You are invincible at the initial cast and at the end of the skill
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Legacy Restoration
fifthMain.shortDesc:
2% max MP will be consumed every sec while casting and after casting
Duration: 30 sec, Damage: 40%, Aether obtained: 75%, +2 aether swords that can be commanded with Hunting Decree
Periodically spreads enchanted wings to attack 6 mobs with 1800% damage 3 times and restores 9.5% of max HP for you and your party members.
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Increases %Damage, Aether Weaving generation rate, the maximum number of swords commanded by
details: Periodically, your wings flap dealing damage to nearby enemies and healing nearby party members and yourself

fifthMain.name: Storm
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Duration: 14 sec. Automatically attacks up to 7 nearby enemies periodically, for 500% damage 2 time(s).\nThe skill's attack count is increased by 2 for every 2 aether swords recalled beyond the first pair.\nCooldown: 90 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Commands all your swords to gather and surround yourself in a storm of swords
details: Based on the number of swords that were active when Storm is used, the number of hits per attack is increased
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Adele is STR warrior class part of the Flora class group. Adele has a secondary resource (unlocked in 2nd Job) that is used to create 'Aether Swords' that can be commanded
